備考　Note
Continuous assessment of students uses this grading:
S (90+%) = above expectations
A (80-89%) = meets expectations
B (70-79%) = below expectations
C (60-69%) = far below expectations
D (59% and below) = fail
Missing more than 4 classes will result in failure of the course.
